actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1451.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 12584) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities under that Act relating to health services research and health statistics and to establish a National Center for Health Care Technology, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 12584 (National Center for Health Care Technology).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 12584) to amend the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend the authorities under that Act relating to health services research and health statistics and to establish a National Center for Health Care Technology, and for other purposes.
